title: New: ECSTASY – Requise
content:
With an EP released through National Anthem at the end of last year, London outfit ECSTASY appear to have parted ways with the label, reverting to doing things their own way.

New track, Requise picks up where the EP left off, sugary sweet, over the top synth pop at it’s very best. Ecstasy know exactly how to hit the spot.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
